executive_summary:
Empowered ecosystems bloom under superintelligent stewardship
Tone: Audacious yet grounded in measurable impact.
Empowerment: Communities, founders, and institutions co-create prosperity with AGI copilots.

initiatives.name: Community Catalyst Pods

projected_outcomes: Projected growth: Empowered founders deliver 250% reinvestment into community-owned ventures
